tasks: Maximum overlap area of a convex polyhedron and a convex polygon under translation
results: O(n log^2 n) time complexity for maximizing overlap area
O(n log^3 n) time complexity for three convex polygons
O(n log^2 n) time complexity for minimizing symmetric difference
title:
Maximum overlap area of a convex polyhedron and a convex polygon under
  translation
abstract: Let $P$ be a convex polyhedron and $Q$ be a convex polygon with $n$ vertices in total in three-dimensional space. We present a deterministic algorithm that finds a translation vector $v \in \mathbb{R}^3$ maximizing the overlap area $|P \cap (Q + v)|$ in $O(n \log^2 n)$ time. We then apply our algorithm to solve two related problems. We give an $O(n \log^3 n)$ time algorithm that finds the maximum overlap area of three convex polygons with $n$ vertices in total. We also give an $O(n \log^2 n)$ time algorithm that minimizes the symmetric difference of two convex polygons under scaling and translation.
